sentences.sentence: His bad eyesight exempted him from military service.
sentences.translation: 他因视力不好而免服兵役。

sentences.sentence: Even then several states automatically exempted women from jury duty unless they personally asked to have their names included on the jury list.
sentences.translation: 即便如此，仍有几个州自动免除了妇女担任陪审员的职责，除非她们亲自要求将自己的名字列入陪审团名单。

sentences.sentence: In 1983, charities were exempted from paying the tax.
